translations: 使烦扰；耍花招（等于 chivy）

sentences.sentence: We need someone dynamic to chivvy the team along.
sentences.translation: 我们需要一个充满活力的人督促团队的工作。

sentences.sentence: Help prisoner Chivvy to escape this deadly game show!
sentences.translation: 帮助囚犯烦扰摆脱这种致命的游戏节目！

sentences.sentence: I shall come down your burrow and chivvy you out like an old stoat.
sentences.translation: 我要钻进你的地洞里去，象赶一只老鼬鼠一般把你赶出来。
